conventions.dash_policy: classify em/en/hyphen as separate tokens; all dash types normalize to "-"
conventions.bracket_policy: strip underscores and outer brackets from stage spans

spans.text: Several young French Lords, that serve with Bertram in the Florentine
RYNALDO, servant to the Countess of Rossillon.
Clown, servant to the Countess of Rossillon.
A Page, servant to the Countess of Rossillon.
COUNTESS OF ROSSILLON, mother to Bertram.
HELENA, a Gentlewoman protected by the Countess.
VIOLENTA, neighbour and friend to the Widow.
MARIANA, neighbour and friend to the Widow.
Lords attending on the KING; Officers; Soldiers, &c., French and
SCENE: Partly in France, and partly in Tuscany.
